TopicTitle: I forgot how much i love this song!

Articles.Content:
Dave did it better:

Jus' my opinion.

he did pretty good. I love it, it makes me think, This may seem a bit silly to some of you, but i often think, if the world concentrated more on science and exploration, instead of fighting over resources and who's god is right.wrong, then we would be so much better off.

You don't live in your street, or area, or postcode. You live on the same pale blue dot as all of us.

And it's in our own interest to look after it, and explore, discover, and travel beyond what we can see from our own back yard.

The universe is an amazing thing, and if we would all spend more time looking up in hope, rather than looking down in despair, then our race/planet, would improve immeasurably. Peace Kerbals!

I love that song too.

I've been wanting to make a KSP themed cinematic to this song for a while now.

I love that song too.
